title: Home and Away spoilers: Raffy suddenly leaves the Bay for good in emotional scenes
text:
Raffy leaves the Bay (Picture: Channel 5)

Raffy (Olivia Deeble) has been struggling to find a solution for managing her epilepsy after discovering the medicinal cannabis trial she was on had to be pulled due to lack of funding. With her studies starting to severely suffer and her future looking a lot less bright, Raffy is close to breaking point when Dr Alex (Zoe Ventoura) mentions there is another trial starting up in Victoria.

Justin (James Stewart) is reluctant to let her go on it until he speaks more with Dr Alex – and also Brody (Jackson Heywood). He then returns to his little sister and says that if she’s accepted onto the trial, she can go and live with Brody and Simone (Emily Eskell).

The teen’s luck starts to turn around as Raffy excitedly announces she’s been accepted, and Justin is overjoyed that she will be able to start getting back on the right path with her life. Raffy is nervous about how to tell Marilyn (Emily Symons) and John (Shane Withington) she’s leaving, but Justin says they’ll do it together.

Marilyn is upset that Raffy is leaving (Picture: Channel 5)

While Maz and John are genuinely happy for Raffy, Marilyn lets the act of pure happiness drop once Raffy has left and lets her devastation trickle in. She’s heartbroken that her foster daughter is leaving, especially after Jett recently left the Bay to build a new life in the city.

Meanwhile, Ryder (Lukas Radovich) is also shaken to find that his best friend is leaving, but Raffy reassures him they will still be mates. As the trial is starting soon, Raffy leaves in the afternoon, being congratulated by Mason (Orpheus Pledger) as she prepares to go. Everyone gathers around her as she says goodbye, and she waves from the car as Justin drives her to the airport.

However, while Raffy is clearly overjoyed to be starting a new chapter in life, Marilyn and John are devastated that she didn’t even say goodbye properly. The pair have had barely any time to wrap their heads around the fact Raffy is leaving, and all of a sudden she’s simply disappeared without acknowledging them….
